title: EventBridge to AppSync (real-time)
description: Create real time subscriptions from EventBridge to AppSync

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern configures AppSync as an EventBridge target allowing consumers subscribe to real-time updates using AppSync
Events published on the event bus are forwared to the Mutation on the AppSync GraphQL schema. Consumers of the API can subscribe in real time.
Using the GraphQL subscriptions you can listen for changes based on account, region, detail-type or source
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
